Title: Relates to the criminal possession of a ghost gun; repealer
Summary: Relates to the criminal possession of a ghost gun; makes such possession a class C felony unless you are a licensed gunsmith or dealer in firearms with intent to manufacture and/or distribute such firearms; requires educational materials shall be provided for no less than 2 years after the effective date of such provisions.
LawCode: Rpld ยง265.01 sub 9, amd ยง265.03, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to criminal possession of a ghost gun; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
